jade.fov
Class CircularRay

java.lang.Object
  jade.path.Bresenham
      jade.fov.SquareRay
          jade.fov.CircularRay
All Implemented Interfaces:
FoV, Path
public class CircularRay
extends SquareRay

This implementation of FoV uses raycasting with a circular range limit. It is fast and simple.

Method Detail

calcFoV

public java.util.Collection<Coord> calcFoV(World world,
                                           int x,
                                           int y,
                                           int range)
Description copied from interface: FoV
Calculates field of vision from a given tile on world. The passable method is used to determine if light can continue through a square. The field of vision is limited by the range.

Specified by:
calcFoV in interface FoV
Overrides:
calcFoV in class SquareRay
Parameters:
world - the world on which the field will be calculated
x - the x-coordinate of the origion of the field of vision
y - the y-coordinate of the origion of the field of vision
range - the maximum range for the field of vision
Returns:
a Collection of tiles in the field of vision
